titleText: Microsoft says it will defend its 39 ‘dreamers’ in court if the government tries to deport them
mainText: After the Trump administration announced Tuesday that it would begin to unwind an Obama-era program that shields younger undocumented immigrants from deportation, Microsoft vowed to defend its workers in court. The move follows a week of…

titleText: EY teams up with Maersk, Microsoft on blockchain-based marine insurance

titleText: Microsoft adds new Insider Lab for Enterprise for testing Windows 10 Enterprise features
